title: Update failed (as usual)
body:
Once again, league updating is broken for me.  Tried everything I can find from Google searches (deleting lol_air_client, completely cleaning league off my computer and reinstalling, deleting the contents of the lol_game_client_sln folder), and nothing has worked.

Not really sure what to do at this point.  No idea how rito continues to have these problems after years and years and years, how can you not get patching your own game right?

replies.body: welp I guess I can just never play league again
my friend is having the same problem and the hextech repair tool didn't work for him

The resources you're using through searching might be unofficial and lead towards more issues.  There may be an issue with your game files that's failing to update your game properly.  Try the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use the repatch utility to fix up your game files.  Try another update after that, and let me know how it goes!
Did that before the cleaning off the league files and it didn't work, just did it again and it didn't help.  No firewalls or antivirus messing it up.
